name: kvtree
description:
KVTree provides a fully extensible C datastructure modeled after perl
hashes.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: zlib
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
MPItrampoline: A forwarding MPI implementation that can use any other
MPI implementation via an MPI ABI.

dependent_to.name: filo
dependent_to.description: File flush and fetch, with MPI

dependent_to.name: er
dependent_to.description: Encoding and redundancy on a file set

dependent_to.name: axom
dependent_to.description:
Axom provides a robust, flexible software infrastructure for the
development of multi-physics applications and computational tools.

dependent_to.name: redset
dependent_to.description: Create MPI communicators for disparate redundancy sets

dependent_to.name: scr
dependent_to.description:
SCR caches checkpoint data in storage on the compute nodes of a Linux
cluster to provide a fast, scalable checkpoint/restart capability for
MPI codes
